long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The anti-dote to slow reading. A nifty Text-to-speech processor, which allows you to choose the speed at which the selected text gets read back to you. You can increase the narration speed up to 1000% of that which a normal reading speed would be (if you like). Use forever. No monthly costs. Enjoy.
